alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Parke; Tippecanoe; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 01 at 10:57PM EST until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues or the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Elliston down to Hazleton. Wabash River at Lafayette down to Riverton. Mississinewa River at Ridgeville. .Antecedent soil moisture...and upwards of an additional one and a half inches of rainfall this weekend...has returned several rivers to flood. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Lafayette. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowland flooding is in progress. High water affects river cabins near North 9th Street. Low county roads are nearly impassable. Tapawingo Park in West Lafayette begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 PM EST Saturday the stage was 12.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 PM EST Saturday was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 13.0 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall to 12.9 feet and begin rising again tomorrow morning. It will rise to 13.5 feet Monday morning. It will then fall again but remain above flood stage. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued by noon Sunday.
